subdisciplines.name: Classical Studies
subdisciplines.description: The interdisciplinary study of the ancient Greek and Roman world, its language, literature, history, culture, and society.

subdisciplines.name: Medieval Latin Literature
subdisciplines.description: The study of Latin literature written during the Middle Ages, from the 6th to the 14th centuries.

subdisciplines.name: Humanism
subdisciplines.description: A philosophical and literary movement that began during the Renaissance in Italy, characterized by a renewed interest in ancient Greek and Roman culture and human values.
